definition: for which money is paid, (United Kingdom) a paid magistrate (appointed by the Home Secretary) dealing with police cases
details:
adjective
- for which money is paid
= synonyms: salaried
- receiving or eligible for compensation
= synonyms: salaried
- pertaining to or of the nature of a stipend or allowance
= example: pertaining to or of the nature of a stipend or allowance
noun
- (United Kingdom) a paid magistrate (appointed by the Home Secretary) dealing with police cases
= synonyms: stipendiary magistrate
